entry.def: major and minor relief red like blood; stools and urine are red like blood

sense.def: Illness Sign of stools and urine assuming a red color like blood. Ben cao tu jing 本草圖經 Substance Entry hu huang lian 胡黃連：治傷寒勞復，身熱，大小便赤如血色者 , “It cures cases of harm caused by cold recurrence because of exhaustion, with a hot body and stools and urine being red like blood ”.
